Source.Name: budgie-cpufreq-applet
Source.Summary: A budgie-desktop applet to control the frequency of the processor (Sandy Bridge and newer).
Source.Description: A budgie-desktop applet to control the frequency of the processor (Sandy Bridge and newer). Applet can manage intel_pstate driver (turbo boost, CPU frequency scaling, governor).

Package.Name: budgie-cpufreq-applet
Package.Summary: A budgie-desktop applet to control the frequency of the processor (Sandy Bridge and newer).
Package.Description: A budgie-desktop applet to control the frequency of the processor (Sandy Bridge and newer). Applet can manage intel_pstate driver (turbo boost, CPU frequency scaling, governor).
